sentences.sContent: Emergency services seem impotent in the face of such a disaster.
sentences.sCn: 面对这种灾难，应急服务机构似乎无能为力。

synos.tran: 无力的；无效的；虚弱的；[泌尿]阳萎的

words.tran: 虚弱地；无能为力地；阳痿地
[泌尿][中医] 阳萎；虚弱；无效（等于impotency）
无力；无效；无法可想；性无能

trans.tranOther: unable to take effective action because you do not have enough power, strength, or control
